name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carl Sterling GARNETT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carl Sterling GARNETT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Court of Common Pleas of Chester County is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: George J. D’Ambrosio, West Chester, for appellant.
Lee Ruslander, Chief, Appeals Div., Joseph Carroll, Asst. Dist. Atty., West Chester, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1015
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Carl Sterling GARNETT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 18, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
George J. D’Ambrosio, West Chester, for appellant.
Lee Ruslander, Chief, Appeals Div., Joseph Carroll, Asst. Dist. Atty., West Chester, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
